abstract: Judge George O'Toole Jr, presiding in federal death penalty trial of Boston Marathon bombing defendant Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, says he is not discouraged by slow progress of jury selection.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the federal death penalty trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the Boston Marathon bombing, said Monday that he was not discouraged by the slow pace of jury selection.
snippet: The judge in the federal death penalty trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the defendant in the Boston Marathon bombing, said Monday that he was not discouraged by the slow pace of jury selection.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Judge Unfazed by Pace of Bomb Trial
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Judge Unfazed by Pace of Bomb Trial
